trans-unit.source: pad / ffill: propagate last valid observation forward to next valid
trans-unit.target: pad/ffill:将上一个有效的观测值向前传播到下一个有效的观测值。

trans-unit.source: pad / ffill: propagate last valid observation forward to next valid.
trans-unit.target: pad/ffill:将上一个有效观测值向前传播到下一个有效观测值。

trans-unit.source: pandaSDMX is a library to retrieve and acquire statistical data and metadata disseminated in SDMX 2.1, an ISO-standard widely used by institutions such as statistics offices, central banks, and international organisations. pandaSDMX can expose datasets and related structural metadata including data flows, code-lists, and data structure definitions as pandas Series or MultiIndexed DataFrames.
trans-unit.target: pandaSDMX是一个用于检索和获取SDMX 2.1中分发的统计数据和元数据的库，SDMX 2.1是被统计机构，中央银行和国际组织等机构广泛使用的ISO标准。pandaSDMX可以将数据集和相关的结构元数据（包括数据流，代码列表和数据结构定义）公开为pandas Series或MultiIndexed DataFrames。

trans-unit.source: pandas (pd) and Numpy (np) are the only two abbreviated imported modules. The rest are kept explicitly imported for newer users.
trans-unit.target: pandas (pd)和Numpy (np)是仅有的两个简略的导入模块。其余的模块都是为新用户明确导入的。

trans-unit.source: pandas Index objects support duplicate values. If a non-unique index is used as the group key in a groupby operation, all values for the same index value will be considered to be in one group and thus the output of aggregation functions will only contain unique index values:
trans-unit.target: pandas Index 对象支持重复值。如果在groupby操作中将非唯一索引用作组键，则将同一索引值的所有值都视为一个组，因此聚合函数的输出将仅包含唯一索引值：

trans-unit.source: pandas does allow you to provide multiple lambdas. In this case, pandas will mangle the name of the (nameless) lambda functions, appending _<i> to each subsequent lambda.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫确实允许您提供多个lambda。在这种情况下，pandas将破坏（无名）lambda函数的名称，并将 _<i> 附加到每个后续的lambda。

trans-unit.source: pandas aligns all AXES when setting Series and DataFrame from .loc, and .iloc.
trans-unit.target: 从 .loc 和 .iloc 设置 Series 和 DataFrame 时，pandas对齐所有AXES 。

trans-unit.source: pandas allows indexing with NA values in a boolean array, which are treated as False.
trans-unit.target: pandas允许使用布尔数组中的 NA 值建立索引，这些值被视为 False 。

trans-unit.source: pandas allows you to capture both representations and convert between them. Under the hood, pandas represents timestamps using instances of Timestamp and sequences of timestamps using instances of DatetimeIndex. For regular time spans, pandas uses Period objects for scalar values and PeriodIndex for sequences of spans. Better support for irregular intervals with arbitrary start and end points are forth-coming in future releases.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫可让您捕获两种表示形式并在它们之间进行转换。在幕后，pandas使用 Timestamp 实例表示时间戳，并使用 DatetimeIndex 实例表示时间戳序列。对于常规时间跨度，pandas将 Period 对象用于标量值，将 PeriodIndex 用于跨度序列。将来的发行版中将更好地支持具有任意起点和终点的不规则间隔。

trans-unit.source: pandas also allows you to set how numbers are displayed in the console. This option is not set through the set_options API.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫还允许您设置控制台中数字的显示方式。未通过 set_options API设置此选项。

trans-unit.source: pandas also automatically registers formatters and locators that recognize date indices, thereby extending date and time support to practically all plot types available in matplotlib. Although this formatting does not provide the same level of refinement you would get when plotting via pandas, it can be faster when plotting a large number of points.
trans-unit.target: pandas 还会自动注册能够识别日期指数的格式化和定位器,从而将日期和时间的支持扩展到 matplotlib 中几乎所有的绘图类型。虽然这种格式化不能提供与通过pandas绘图时相同的精细程度,但在绘制大量点时,它的速度会更快。

trans-unit.source: pandas also defines the types category, and datetime64[ns, tz], which are not integrated into the normal NumPy hierarchy and won’t show up with the above function.
trans-unit.target: pandas还定义了类别 category 和 datetime64[ns, tz] ，它们没有集成到正常的NumPy层次结构中，因此不会在上述函数中显示。

trans-unit.source: pandas also handles element-wise comparisons between different array-like objects of the same length:
trans-unit.target: pandas还可以处理相同长度的不同数组类对象之间的元素比较。

trans-unit.source: pandas and third-party libraries extend NumPy’s type system in a few places. This section describes the extensions pandas has made internally. See Extension types for how to write your own extension that works with pandas. See Extension data types for a list of third-party libraries that have implemented an extension.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫和第三方库在一些地方扩展了NumPy的类型系统。本节描述了熊猫在内部所做的扩展。有关如何编写与熊猫一起使用的扩展名，请参见扩展名类型。请参阅扩展数据类型，以获取已实现扩展的第三方库的列表。

trans-unit.source: pandas and third-party libraries can extend NumPy’s type system (see Extension types). The top-level array() method can be used to create a new array, which may be stored in a Series, Index, or as a column in a DataFrame.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫和第三方库可以扩展NumPy的类型系统（请参见扩展类型）。顶级 array() 方法可用于创建一个新数组，该数组可以存储在 Series ， Index 或 DataFrame 中的列中。

trans-unit.source: pandas can be installed via pip from PyPI.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过PyPI的 pip安装熊猫。

trans-unit.source: pandas can include categorical data in a DataFrame. For full docs, see the categorical introduction and the API documentation.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫可以在 DataFrame 中包含分类数据。有关完整的文档，请参阅分类介绍和API文档。

trans-unit.source: pandas can represent integer data with possibly missing values using arrays.IntegerArray. This is an extension types implemented within pandas.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫可以使用 arrays.IntegerArray 表示可能具有缺失值的整数数据。这是在熊猫中实现的扩展类型。

trans-unit.source: pandas cannot natively represent a column or index with mixed timezones. If your CSV file contains columns with a mixture of timezones, the default result will be an object-dtype column with strings, even with parse_dates.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫无法原生表示具有混合时区的列或索引。如果您的CSV文件包含带有时区混合的列，则默认结果将是带有字符串的object-dtype列，甚至包含 parse_dates 。

trans-unit.source: pandas captures 4 general time related concepts:
trans-unit.target: pandas抓住了4个一般的时间相关概念。

trans-unit.source: pandas chooses an Excel writer via two methods:
trans-unit.target: pandas通过两种方法选择Excel写手。

trans-unit.source: pandas contains a compact set of APIs for performing windowing operations - an operation that performs an aggregation over a sliding partition of values. The API functions similarly to the groupby API in that Series and DataFrame call the windowing method with necessary parameters and then subsequently call the aggregation function.
trans-unit.target: pandas包含一组紧凑的API，用于执行窗口操作-一种在值的滑动分区上执行聚合的操作。该API的功能类似于 groupby API，因为 Series 和 DataFrame 使用必要的参数调用windowing方法，然后再调用聚合函数。

trans-unit.source: pandas contains extensive capabilities and features for working with time series data for all domains. Using the NumPy datetime64 and timedelta64 dtypes, pandas has consolidated a large number of features from other Python libraries like scikits.timeseries as well as created a tremendous amount of new functionality for manipulating time series data.
trans-unit.target: pandas包含用于处理所有域的时间序列数据的广泛功能。通过使用NumPy datetime64 和 timedelta64 dtype，pandas整合了其他Python库中的大量功能，例如 scikits.timeseries ，并创建了大量用于处理时间序列数据的新功能。

trans-unit.source: pandas currently does not preserve the dtype in apply functions: If you apply along rows you get a Series of objectdtype (same as getting a row -> getting one element will return a basic type) and applying along columns will also convert to object. NaN values are unaffected. You can use fillna to handle missing values before applying a function.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫目前不会保留在应用功能的D型：如果你沿着行申请你得到一个 Series 的 object dtype （与获取行- >获得一个元素将返回一个基本型），并沿列应用也将转换为对象。 NaN 值不受影响。您可以在应用函数之前使用 fillna 处理缺失值。

trans-unit.source: pandas defines a custom data type for representing data that can take only a limited, fixed set of values. The dtype of a Categorical can be described by a pandas.api.types.CategoricalDtype.
trans-unit.target: pandas定义了一种自定义数据类型，用于表示只能采用有限的固定值集的数据。一的D型细胞 Categorical 可以通过描述 pandas.api.types.CategoricalDtype 。

trans-unit.source: pandas encourages the second style, which is known as method chaining. pipe makes it easy to use your own or another library’s functions in method chains, alongside pandas’ methods.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫鼓励使用第二种样式，即方法链接。 pipe 使您可以轻松地在方法链中使用您自己的库或其他库的函数以及熊猫的方法。

trans-unit.source: pandas follows the NumPy convention of raising an error when you try to convert something to a bool. This happens in an if-statement or when using the boolean operations: and, or, and not. It is not clear what the result of the following code should be:
trans-unit.target: 熊猫遵循NumPy约定，当您尝试将某物转换为 bool 时会引发错误。这是在 if 语句中或在使用布尔操作时发生的： and ， or ，而 not 。目前尚不清楚以下代码的结果是什么：

trans-unit.source: pandas has a simple, powerful, and efficient functionality for performing resampling operations during frequency conversion (e.g., converting secondly data into 5-minutely data). This is extremely common in, but not limited to, financial applications.
trans-unit.target: pandas具有简单、强大、高效的功能,可以在变频过程中执行重采样操作(如将秒速时时彩走势图数据转换为5分钟数据)。这在金融应用中极为常见,但不限于此。

trans-unit.source: pandas has an options system that lets you customize some aspects of its behaviour, display-related options being those the user is most likely to adjust.
trans-unit.target: pandas有一个选项系统,可以让你自定义其行为的某些方面,与显示相关的选项是用户最有可能调整的。

trans-unit.source: pandas has been used extensively in production in financial applications.
trans-unit.target: pandas在生产中被广泛用于金融应用。

trans-unit.source: pandas has full-featured, high performance in-memory join operations idiomatically very similar to relational databases like SQL. These methods perform significantly better (in some cases well over an order of magnitude better) than other open source implementations (like base::merge.data.frame in R). The reason for this is careful algorithmic design and the internal layout of the data in DataFrame.
trans-unit.target: pandas具有功能全面的，高性能的内存中连接操作，这在习惯上与SQL之类的关系数据库非常相似。与其他开源实现（例如R中的 base::merge.data.frame ）相比，这些方法的性能明显更好（在某些情况下要好一个数量级）。这样做的原因是仔细的算法设计和 DataFrame 中数据的内部布局。

trans-unit.source: pandas has simple, powerful, and efficient functionality for performing resampling operations during frequency conversion (e.g., converting secondly data into 5-minutely data). This is extremely common in, but not limited to, financial applications. See the Time Series section.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫具有简单，强大和高效的功能，可在频率转换过程中执行重采样操作（例如，将第二数据转换为5分钟数据）。这在金融应用程序中非常普遍，但不仅限于此。请参阅“时间序列”部分。

trans-unit.source: pandas has support for accelerating certain types of binary numerical and boolean operations using the numexpr library and the bottleneck libraries.
trans-unit.target: pandas支持使用 numexpr 库和 bottleneck 库来加速某些类型的二进制数值和布尔运算。

trans-unit.source: pandas has the SettingWithCopyWarning because assigning to a copy of a slice is frequently not intentional, but a mistake caused by chained indexing returning a copy where a slice was expected.
trans-unit.target: pandas具有 SettingWithCopyWarning ,因为分配给切片的副本通常不是故意的，而是由链式索引导致的错误，该错误会在预期的切片处返回副本。

trans-unit.source: pandas has two ways to store strings.
trans-unit.target: pandas有两种方式来存储字符串。

trans-unit.source: pandas includes automatic tick resolution adjustment for regular frequency time-series data. For limited cases where pandas cannot infer the frequency information (e.g., in an externally created twinx), you can choose to suppress this behavior for alignment purposes.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫包括针对常规频率时间序列数据的自动刻度分辨率调整。对于熊猫无法推断频率信息的有限情况（例如，在外部创建的 twinx 中），可以出于对齐目的选择抑制此行为。

trans-unit.source: pandas integrates with this external package. if pandas-gbq is installed, you can use the pandas methods pd.read_gbq and DataFrame.to_gbq, which will call the respective functions from pandas-gbq.
trans-unit.target: pandas与此外部程序包集成。如果已安装 pandas-gbq ,则可以使用pandas方法 pd.read_gbq 和 DataFrame.to_gbq ，这将从 pandas-gbq 中调用相应的函数。

trans-unit.source: pandas is fast. Many of the low-level algorithmic bits have been extensively tweaked in Cython code. However, as with anything else generalization usually sacrifices performance. So if you focus on one feature for your application you may be able to create a faster specialized tool.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫快。许多低级算法位已在Cython代码中进行了广泛的调整。但是，与其他方法一样，泛化通常会牺牲性能。因此，如果您专注于应用程序的一项功能，则可以创建一个更快的专用工具。

trans-unit.source: pandas is a NumFOCUS sponsored project. This will help ensure the success of development of pandas as a world-class open-source project, and makes it possible to donate to the project.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫是NumFOCUS赞助的项目。这将有助于确保将熊猫开发成功作为世界一流的开源项目，并有可能向该项目捐款。

trans-unit.source: pandas is a dependency of statsmodels, making it an important part of the statistical computing ecosystem in Python.
trans-unit.target: pandas是statsmodels的依赖项，使其成为Python统计计算生态系统的重要组成部分。

trans-unit.source: pandas is able to read and write line-delimited json files that are common in data processing pipelines using Hadoop or Spark.
trans-unit.target: pandas能够读写在使用Hadoop或Spark的数据处理管道中常见的限行json文件。

trans-unit.source: pandas is actively supported today by a community of like-minded individuals around the world who contribute their valuable time and energy to help make open source pandas possible. Thanks to all of our contributors.
trans-unit.target: 今天，大熊猫得到了世界各地志同道合的个人的积极支持，他们付出了宝贵的时间和精力来帮助使开源熊猫成为可能。感谢我们所有的贡献者。

trans-unit.source: pandas is equipped with an exhaustive set of unit tests, covering about 97% of the code base as of this writing. To run it on your machine to verify that everything is working (and that you have all of the dependencies, soft and hard, installed), make sure you have pytest >= 4.0.2 and Hypothesis >= 3.58, then run:
trans-unit.target: pandas配备了详尽的单元测试集，在撰写本文时，它覆盖了约97％的代码库。要在计算机上运行它以验证一切正常（并已安装所有依赖项，包括软和硬），请确保您的pytest > = 4.0.2和Hypothesis > = 3.58，然后运行：

trans-unit.source: pandas is just one library offering a DataFrame API. Because of its popularity, pandas’ API has become something of a standard that other libraries implement. The pandas documentation maintains a list of libraries implementing a DataFrame API in our ecosystem page.
trans-unit.target: pandas只是一个提供DataFrame API的库。由于其受欢迎程度，熊猫的API已成为其他图书馆实施的标准。pandas文档在我们的生态系统页面中维护了实现DataFrame API的库列表。

trans-unit.source: pandas is well suited for many different kinds of data:
trans-unit.target: pandas很适合处理许多不同种类的数据。

trans-unit.source: pandas itself only supports IO with a limited set of file formats that map cleanly to its tabular data model. For reading and writing other file formats into and from pandas, we recommend these packages from the broader community.
trans-unit.target: pandas本身只支持有限的一组文件格式的IO,这些文件格式可以清晰地映射到它的表格数据模型。对于在pandas中读取和写入其他文件格式,我们推荐更广泛的社区的这些包。

trans-unit.source: pandas objects (Index, Series, DataFrame) can be thought of as containers for arrays, which hold the actual data and do the actual computation. For many types, the underlying array is a numpy.ndarray. However, pandas and 3rd party libraries may extend NumPy’s type system to add support for custom arrays (see dtypes).
trans-unit.target: 可以将pandas对象（ Index ， Series ， DataFrame ）视为数组的容器，该数组保存实际数据并进行实际计算。对于许多类型，基础数组是 numpy.ndarray 。但是，熊猫和第三方库可能会扩展NumPy的类型系统以添加对自定义数组的支持（请参阅dtypes）。

trans-unit.source: pandas objects also have the dict-like items() method to iterate over the (key, value) pairs.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫对象还具有类似dict的 items() 方法，以迭代（键，值）对。

trans-unit.source: pandas objects are equipped with various data manipulation methods for dealing with missing data.
trans-unit.target: pandas对象配备了各种数据处理方法来处理缺失的数据。

trans-unit.source: pandas objects can be split on any of their axes. The abstract definition of grouping is to provide a mapping of labels to group names. To create a GroupBy object (more on what the GroupBy object is later), you may do the following:
trans-unit.target: pandas对象可以在它们的任何轴上进行分割。分组的抽象定义是提供标签到组名的映射。要创建GroupBy对象(后面会详细介绍GroupBy对象的内容),你可以做如下操作。

trans-unit.source: pandas objects have a number of attributes enabling you to access the metadata
trans-unit.target: pandas对象有许多属性,使你能够访问元数据。

trans-unit.source: pandas offers various functions to try to force conversion of types from the object dtype to other types. In cases where the data is already of the correct type, but stored in an object array, the DataFrame.infer_objects() and Series.infer_objects() methods can be used to soft convert to the correct type.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了各种功能来尝试强制将类型从 object dtype转换为其他类型。如果数据已经是正确的类型，但是存储在 object 数组中，则可以使用 DataFrame.infer_objects() 和 Series.infer_objects() 方法进行软转换为正确的类型。

trans-unit.source: pandas primarily uses the value np.nan to represent missing data. It is by default not included in computations. See the Missing Data section.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫主要使用值 np.nan 表示丢失的数据。默认情况下，它不包括在计算中。请参阅“缺少数据”部分。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides a .sparse accessor, similar to .str for string data, .cat for categorical data, and .dt for datetime-like data. This namespace provides attributes and methods that are specific to sparse data.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了一个 .sparse 访问器，类似于用于字符串数据的 .str ，用于分类数据的 .cat 以及用于类似日期时间的数据的 .dt 。该名称空间提供了特定于稀疏数据的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides a nullable integer dtype, but you must explicitly request it when creating the series or column. Notice that we use a capital “I” in the dtype="Int64".
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了可为空的整数dtype，但是在创建系列或列时必须显式请求它。注意，我们在 dtype="Int64" 使用大写字母“ I ”。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides a relatively compact and self-contained set of tools for performing the above tasks and more.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了一套相对紧凑、自成体系的工具,用于执行上述任务以及更多的任务。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides a single function, merge(), as the entry point for all standard database join operations between DataFrame or named Series objects:
trans-unit.target: pandas提供单个函数 merge() ，作为 DataFrame 或命名的 Series 对象之间所有标准数据库联接操作的入口点：

trans-unit.source: pandas provides a suite of methods in order to get purely integer based indexing. The semantics follow closely Python and NumPy slicing. These are 0-based indexing. When slicing, the start bound is included, while the upper bound is excluded. Trying to use a non-integer, even a valid label will raise an IndexError.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了一组方法来获得纯粹基于整数的索引。语义严格遵循Python和NumPy切片。这些是 0-based 索引。切片时，包括开始边界，但不包括上限。尝试使用非整数，即使有效标签也将引发 IndexError 。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides a suite of methods in order to have purely label based indexing. This is a strict inclusion based protocol. Every label asked for must be in the index, or a KeyError will be raised. When slicing, both the start bound AND the stop bound are included, if present in the index. Integers are valid labels, but they refer to the label and not the position.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了一套方法，以便具有纯粹基于标签的索引。这是一个基于严格包含的协议。要求的每个标签都必须在索引中，否则将引发 KeyError 。切片时，如果索引中存在起始边界和终止边界，则都将包括在内。整数是有效的标签，但它们引用的是标签，而不是position。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides a utility function to take a dict or list of dicts and normalize this semi-structured data into a flat table.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了一种实用程序功能，用于获取一个字典或字典列表并将此半结构化数据标准化为一个平面表。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides custom formatters for timeseries plots. These change the formatting of the axis labels for dates and times. By default, the custom formatters are applied only to plots created by pandas with DataFrame.plot() or Series.plot(). To have them apply to all plots, including those made by matplotlib, set the option pd.options.plotting.matplotlib.register_converters = True or use pandas.plotting.register_matplotlib_converters().
trans-unit.target: 熊猫提供了用于时间序列图的自定义格式化程序。这些更改日期和时间的轴标签的格式。默认情况下，自定义格式化程序仅适用于由熊猫使用 DataFrame.plot() 或 Series.plot() 创建的图。要将它们应用于所有图，包括由matplotlib绘制的图，请设置选项 pd.options.plotting.matplotlib.register_converters = True 或使用 pandas.plotting.register_matplotlib_converters() 。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides data structures for efficiently storing sparse data. These are not necessarily sparse in the typical “mostly 0”. Rather, you can view these objects as being “compressed” where any data matching a specific value (NaN / missing value, though any value can be chosen, including 0) is omitted. The compressed values are not actually stored in the array.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫提供了有效存储稀疏数据的数据结构。这些在典型的“大多为0”中不一定稀疏。相反，您可以将这些对象视为“已压缩” ，其中省略了与特定值（ NaN /缺失值，尽管可以选择任何值，包括0）相匹配的任何数据。压缩值实际上没有存储在数组中。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides data structures for in-memory analytics, which makes using pandas to analyze datasets that are larger than memory datasets somewhat tricky. Even datasets that are a sizable fraction of memory become unwieldy, as some pandas operations need to make intermediate copies.
trans-unit.target: pandas为内存分析提供了数据结构,这使得使用pandas来分析比内存数据集更大的数据集变得有些棘手。即使是占内存相当一部分的数据集也会变得笨重,因为一些pandas操作需要进行中间拷贝。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides dtype-specific methods under various accessors. These are separate namespaces within Series that only apply to specific data types.
trans-unit.target: pandas在各种访问器下提供特定于dtype的方法。这些是 Series 中单独的命名空间，仅适用于特定的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides rich support for working with timestamps in different time zones using the pytz and dateutil libraries or datetime.timezone objects from the standard library.
trans-unit.target: pandas使用 pytz 和 dateutil 库或标准库中的 datetime.timezone 对象为使用不同时区的时间戳提供了丰富的支持。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides similar vectorized operations by specifying the individual Series in the DataFrame. New columns can be assigned in the same way.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 DataFrame 中指定单个 Series ，pandas提供了类似的矢量化操作。可以用相同的方式分配新列。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides similar vectorized operations by specifying the individual Series in the DataFrame. New columns can be assigned in the same way. The DataFrame.drop() method drops a column from the DataFrame.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 DataFrame 中指定单个 Series ，pandas提供了类似的矢量化操作。可以用相同的方式分配新列。所述 DataFrame.drop() 方法降低从一列 DataFrame 。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides various facilities for easily combining together Series and DataFrame objects with various kinds of set logic for the indexes and relational algebra functionality in the case of join / merge-type operations.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了各种设施,可以轻松地将Series和DataFrame对象组合在一起,并为索引和关系代数功能提供各种不同的集合逻辑,以满足连接/合并类型的操作。

trans-unit.source: pandas provides various facilities for easily combining together Series or DataFrame with various kinds of set logic for the indexes and relational algebra functionality in the case of join / merge-type operations.
trans-unit.target: pandas提供了各种设施,可以轻松地将Series或DataFrame组合在一起,并为索引和关系代数功能提供各种集合逻辑,以满足连接/合并型操作的需要。

trans-unit.source: pandas readily accepts NumPy record arrays, if you need to read in a binary file consisting of an array of C structs. For example, given this C program in a file called main.c compiled with gcc main.c -std=gnu99 on a 64-bit machine,
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要读取由C结构数组组成的二进制文件，pandas会很容易接受NumPy记录数组。例如，假设此C程序位于64位计算机上的 gcc main.c -std=gnu99 编译的名为 main.c 的文件中，

trans-unit.source: pandas represents Timedeltas in nanosecond resolution using 64 bit integers. As such, the 64 bit integer limits determine the Timedelta limits.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫使用64位整数表示纳秒级的 Timedeltas 。这样，64位整数限制确定了 Timedelta 限制。

trans-unit.source: pandas represents spans of times as Period objects.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫将时间跨度表示为“ Period 对象。

trans-unit.source: pandas support for msgpack has been removed in version 1.0.0. It is recommended to use pyarrow for on-the-wire transmission of pandas objects.
trans-unit.target: 在1.0.0版中已删除了对 msgpack 的熊猫支持。建议使用pyarrow进行熊猫对象的在线传输。

trans-unit.source: pandas supports 4 types of windowing operations:
trans-unit.target: pandas支持4种类型的窗口操作。

trans-unit.source: pandas supports converting integer or float epoch times to Timestamp and DatetimeIndex. The default unit is nanoseconds, since that is how Timestamp objects are stored internally. However, epochs are often stored in another unit which can be specified. These are computed from the starting point specified by the origin parameter.
trans-unit.target: pandas支持将整数或浮点纪元时间转换为 Timestamp 和 DatetimeIndex 。默认单位是纳秒，因为这是内部存储 Timestamp 对象的方式。但是，历元通常存储在可以指定的另一个 unit 中。这些是从 origin 参数指定的起点开始计算的。

trans-unit.source: pandas supports non-unique index values. If an operation that does not support duplicate index values is attempted, an exception will be raised at that time. The reason for being lazy is nearly all performance-based (there are many instances in computations, like parts of GroupBy, where the index is not used).
trans-unit.target: pandas支持非唯一索引值。如果尝试进行不支持重复索引值的操作,当时会引发一个异常。懒惰的原因几乎都是基于性能的(计算中有很多实例,比如GroupBy的部分,没有使用索引)。

trans-unit.source: pandas supports three kinds of sorting: sorting by index labels, sorting by column values, and sorting by a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: pandas支持三种排序方式:按索引标签排序、按列值排序和两者结合排序。

trans-unit.source: pandas supports writing Excel files to buffer-like objects such as StringIO or BytesIO using ExcelWriter.
trans-unit.target: pandas支持使用 ExcelWriter 将Excel文件写入类似缓冲区的对象（例如 StringIO 或 BytesIO )。

trans-unit.source: pandas tries to be pragmatic about plotting DataFrames or Series that contain missing data. Missing values are dropped, left out, or filled depending on the plot type.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫尝试对包含缺失数据的 DataFrames 或 Series 进行务实的操作。根据图类型，丢失，遗漏或填充缺失值。

trans-unit.source: pandas uses PyTables for reading and writing HDF5 files, which allows serializing object-dtype data with pickle. Loading pickled data received from untrusted sources can be unsafe.
trans-unit.target: pandas使用PyTables来读写HDF5文件,可以用pickle将对象类型的数据序列化。加载从不信任来源收到的pickled数据可能是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: pandas will raise a KeyError if indexing with a list with missing labels. See list-like Using loc with missing keys in a list is Deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用缺少标签的列表建立索引，熊猫将引发 KeyError 。请参见类似列表的列表。不推荐使用在列表中缺少键的loc。

trans-unit.source: pandas will recognize instances of this class as proper arrays with a custom type and will not attempt to coerce them to objects. They may be stored directly inside a DataFrame or Series.
trans-unit.target: 大熊猫会将此类的实例识别为具有自定义类型的适当数组，并且不会尝试将其强制为对象。它们可以直接存储在 DataFrame 或 Series 中。

trans-unit.source: pandas will try to call the date_parser function in three different ways. If an exception is raised, the next one is tried:
trans-unit.target: 熊猫将尝试以三种不同的方式调用 date_parser 函数。如果引发异常，则尝试下一个：

trans-unit.source: pandas’ nanosecond precision is truncated to microseconds.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫的纳秒精度被截断为微秒。

trans-unit.source: pandas’ own 10 Minutes to pandas.
trans-unit.target: 熊猫自己到熊猫的10分钟。
